name: linter-ui-default

3.4.1.name: linter-ui-default
3.4.1.description: Default UI for the Linter package

scripts.types: (tsc -p ./lib/tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly || echo done) && (shx cp -r ./lib/types/ dist/types && shx rm -rf ./dist/types/linter/)
scripts.test: npm run build.unit && npm run build && npm run test.only
scripts.benchmark: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build.unit && atom --test ./benchmark/benchmark.js
scripts.prepare: npm run get.linter-types && npm run build
scripts.build-commit: npm run clean && npm run types && build-commit -o dist

showPanel.description: Show panel at the bottom of screen

showStatusBar.description: Show status bar with error / warning / info count at the bottom

showDecorations.description: Underline editor text and highlight gutter of issues

showProviderName.description: Show provider name in tooltip (Hint: It's always shown in the panel)

useBusySignal.description: Whether to integrate with the `busy-signal` package

hidePanelWhenEmpty.description: Hide panel when there are no issues to display

alwaysTakeMinimumSpace.description: Auto resizes Linter panel when there are less issues to show

decorateOnTreeView.description: Underline the selected type in TreeView to indicate issues

tooltipFollows.description: Choose whether tooltips show on mouseover, or follow the keyboard cursor

longLineLength.title: Long Line Length
longLineLength.description: If an editor has a line with a length more than this number, linter will skip adding inline linter markers.

largeFileLineCount.title: Large File Line Count
largeFileLineCount.description: If an editor more line numbers than this number, linter will skip adding inline linter markers.

3.4.0.name: linter-ui-default
3.4.0.description: Default UI for the Linter package

scripts.test: npm run build.unit && npm run build && npm run test.only
scripts.benchmark: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build.unit && atom --test ./benchmark/benchmark.js
scripts.prepare: npm run get.linter-types && npm run build
scripts.build-commit: npm run clean && npm run types && build-commit -o dist

showPanel.description: Show panel at the bottom of screen

showStatusBar.description: Show status bar with error / warning / info count at the bottom

showDecorations.description: Underline editor text and highlight gutter of issues

showProviderName.description: Show provider name in tooltip (Hint: It's always shown in the panel)

useBusySignal.description: Whether to integrate with the `busy-signal` package

hidePanelWhenEmpty.description: Hide panel when there are no issues to display

alwaysTakeMinimumSpace.description: Auto resizes Linter panel when there are less issues to show

decorateOnTreeView.description: Underline the selected type in TreeView to indicate issues

largeFileLineCount.title: Large File Line Count
largeFileLineCount.description: If an editor more line numbers than this number, linter will skip adding inline linter markers.

3.3.1.name: linter-ui-default
3.3.1.description: Default UI for the Linter package

scripts.tsc.dev: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=development tsc --watch -p lib/tsconfig.json || echo done && npm run babel
scripts.tsc.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc -p lib/tsconfig.json || echo done && npm run babel
scripts.build: cross-env NODE_ENV=production parcel build --target main ./lib/index.ts && npm run babel.globalThis
scripts.build.clean: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run tsc.build && npm run build && npm run test.only
scripts.benchmark: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run tsc.build && atom --test ./benchmark/benchmark.js

scripts.tsc.build: npm run clean && cross-env NODE_ENV=production tsc -p lib/tsconfig.json || echo done && npm run babel
scripts.build.clean: npm run clean && npm run build
scripts.test: npm run tsc.build && npm run build && npm run test.only
scripts.benchmark: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run tsc.build && atom --test ./benchmark/benchmark.js

showPanel.description: Show panel at the bottom of screen

showStatusBar.description: Show status bar with error / warning / info count at the bottom

showDecorations.description: Underline editor text and highlight gutter of issues

showProviderName.description: Show provider name in tooltip (Hint: It's always shown in the panel)

useBusySignal.description: Whether to integrate with the `busy-signal` package

hidePanelWhenEmpty.description: Hide panel when there are no issues to display

alwaysTakeMinimumSpace.description: Auto resizes Linter panel when there are less issues to show

decorateOnTreeView.description: Underline the selected type in TreeView to indicate issues

tooltipFollows.description: Choose whether tooltips show on mouseover, or follow the keyboard cursor

longLineLength.title: Long Line Length
longLineLength.description: If an editor has a line with a length more than this number, linter will skip adding inline linter markers.

largeFileLineCount.title: Large File Line Count
largeFileLineCount.description: If an editor more line numbers than this number, linter will skip adding inline linter markers.

readme:
# Linter-UI-Default

[![Greenkeeper badge](https://badges.greenkeeper.io/steelbrain/linter-ui-default.svg)](https://greenkeeper.io/)

[![Slack Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/chat-atom.io%20slack-blue.svg?style=flat-square)](http://atom-slack.herokuapp.com/)
![CI](https://github.com/steelbrain/linter-ui-default/workflows/CI/badge.svg)
[![Plugin installs!](https://img.shields.io/apm/dm/linter-ui-default.svg?style=flat-square)](https://atom.io/packages/linter-ui-default)
[![Package version!](https://img.shields.io/apm/v/linter-ui-default.svg?style=flat-square)](https://atom.io/packages/linter-ui-default)
[![Dependencies!](https://img.shields.io/david/steelbrain/linter-ui-default.svg?style=flat-square)](https://david-dm.org/steelbrain/linter-ui-default)

The default UI for linter.

### Installation

You can install it from the CLI

```
apm install linter-ui-default
```

Or you can install from Settings view by searching for `linter-ui-default`.

Linter UI require a recent version of Atom. Download the latest official version from: https://atom.io/

### Screenshots

![tooltip](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16418197/106548395-8577d700-64d4-11eb-9eaa-1974f0903516.png)

![tooltip with multiple messages](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16418197/106654351-a89a9900-655d-11eb-8af2-f6a459720bf3.png)

![tooltip with fold button](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16418197/106548281-52354800-64d4-11eb-9d66-d26ee702cfa5.png)

<!-- ![tooltip expanded](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16418197/106548235-421d6880-64d4-11eb-8c03-89708622043b.png) -->

![full-editor](https://user-images.githubusercontent.com/16418197/110440831-b375ab80-807e-11eb-8b34-4a85b135f180.png)

![panel gif](https://cloud.githubusercontent.com/assets/4278113/23879933/1ab17e2a-0872-11e7-803d-3fe0ccfc6790.gif)

### License

This Project is licensed under the terms of MIT License, check the license file for more info.

metadata.name: linter-ui-default
metadata.description: Default UI for the Linter package

scripts.types: (tsc -p ./lib/tsconfig.json --emitDeclarationOnly || echo done) && (shx cp -r ./lib/types/ dist/types && shx rm -rf ./dist/types/linter/)
scripts.test: npm run build.unit && npm run build && npm run test.only
scripts.benchmark: cross-env NODE_ENV=production npm run build.unit && atom --test ./benchmark/benchmark.js
scripts.prepare: npm run get.linter-types && npm run build
scripts.build-commit: npm run clean && npm run types && build-commit -o dist

showPanel.description: Show panel at the bottom of screen

showStatusBar.description: Show status bar with error / warning / info count at the bottom

showDecorations.description: Underline editor text and highlight gutter of issues

showProviderName.description: Show provider name in tooltip (Hint: It's always shown in the panel)

useBusySignal.description: Whether to integrate with the `busy-signal` package

hidePanelWhenEmpty.description: Hide panel when there are no issues to display

alwaysTakeMinimumSpace.description: Auto resizes Linter panel when there are less issues to show

decorateOnTreeView.description: Underline the selected type in TreeView to indicate issues

tooltipFollows.description: Choose whether tooltips show on mouseover, or follow the keyboard cursor

longLineLength.title: Long Line Length
longLineLength.description: If an editor has a line with a length more than this number, linter will skip adding inline linter markers.

largeFileLineCount.title: Large File Line Count
largeFileLineCount.description: If an editor more line numbers than this number, linter will skip adding inline linter markers.
